typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TCrossReference
TCrossReference filter(code_type_id == 106 && target_code != 'PI') ~> FilterCodetypeIDandTargetCode
FilterCodetypeIDandTargetCode aggregate(groupBy(target_code = target_code),
	target_description = first(target_description)) ~> AggregateTargetCode
AggregateTargetCode derive(dimension_key = 0,
		top_id = 0,
		top_key = 'ALL',
		top_description = 'All Business Areas',
		grp_id = 0,
		grp_key = case(target_code =='EN' || target_code =='BU', 'EG', case(target_code =='PM' || target_code =='PF', 'PI', target_code)),
		grp_description = case(target_code =='EN' || target_code =='BU', 'Energy+', case( target_code =='PM' || target_code =='PF', 'P&I', target_code)),
		bua_id = 0,
		bua_key = case( target_code =='PM' || target_code =='PF', 'PI', target_code),
		bua_description = case( target_code =='PM' || target_code =='PF', 'P&I', target_code),
		bus_id = 0) ~> DeriveTopGrpBus
DeriveTopGrpBus sink(input(
		dimension_key as long,
		top_description as string,
		grp_key as string,
		grp_description as string,
		top_id as decimal(28,10),
		bua_description as string,
		bus_key as string,
		bua_id as decimal(28,10),
		bua_key as string,
		top_key as string,
		grp_id as decimal(28,10),
		bus_description as string,
		bus_id as decimal(28,10)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		dimension_key,
		top_description,
		grp_key,
		grp_description,
		top_id,
		bua_description,
		bus_key = target_code,
		bua_id,
		bua_key,
		top_key,
		grp_id,
		bus_description = target_description,
		bus_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
